textTemplates.name: CallbackMsgText
textTemplates.text: Notification: Call back status saved.

textTemplates.name: CompleteMsgText
textTemplates.text: Notification: Survey completed and CLOSED.

textTemplates.name: RejectMsgText
textTemplates.text: Notification: Customer rejected this Survey and CLOSED

textTemplates.name: UncontactableMsgText
textTemplates.text: Notification: Customer uncontactable status saved.

textTemplates.name: vEnding
textTemplates.text:
If customer give score of 8-10 in both questions:

You may be contacted by a company called IPSOS for a customer satisfaction phone survey. By Mercedes Benz standard, the staff who served you will get 1 point for a score of 10, however he/she will get 0 point for a score of 1 to 9. We hope that you can give us a score of 10 to support the staff.


If not:

How could we do better to get a 10 from you? By Mercedes Benz standard, the staff who served you will get 1 point for a score of 10, however he/she will get 0 point for a score of 1 to 9. We hope that you can give us a score of 10 to support the staff.

textTemplates.name: vEnding2
textTemplates.text:
﻿If customer is not convenient to do the survey:

When would it be convenient to call you back? We really value your feedback and need your help to complete this short survey.

textTemplates.name: vGreetings
textTemplates.text:
Good Morning / Afternoon / Evening, {!vCaseRec.Title__c} {!vCaseRec.Customer_Name__c},


I'm <Name of Caller> calling on behalf of Cycle & Carriage Mercedes Benz.


This is a service follow up call for your recent visit to {!vServiceCentre}.

We just need to ask you 2 questions on your experience at the service center.

May I proceed?

textTemplates.name: vQ1
textTemplates.text:
Question one:

How satisfied are you with the overall service experience in this service center? From a rating of 1-10, 10 being satisfied, could we get a rating of 10 from you?

textTemplates.name: vQ2
textTemplates.text:
Question two:

How likely would you recommend this service center to friends or family? From a rating scale of 1-10, 10 being recommended, could we get a rating of 10 from you?

value.stringValue: Error: Select Date and Time for Call back
Notification: Customer rejected this survey and CLOSED
Select Date and time for Call back
